newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia net foreign reserves at $10.26 bln.
newsitem.headline: Colombia net foreign reserves at $10.26 bln.

text.p: BOGOTA, Aug 19 Reuter - Colombia's net foreign reserves stood at $10.26 billion as of July 25, the last date for which official figures are available, the central bank said Tuesday.
According to central bank figures net foreign reserves were up from $10.25 billion the previous week and have increased 3.8 percent, or $372.9 million, compared to the same period last year.
Gross foreign reserves stood at $10.34 billion as of July 25.
